dmca.title: Jewelers Complain of "Loving Family" Pendant Copyright Infringement (#2)
dmca.body:
Google Requirements for the Digital Millennium Copyright Act
February 26", 2004

1. The copyrighted work appears at the link provided on Google at http://www.google.com/search?hl=en&ie=UTF8&oe=UTF-8&q=loving+family+pendants

2. Google Search Term: LOVING FAMILY PENDANTS
Link as provided on Google search results page above

Mother's Charm Pendants - Loving Family Pendants in 14K gold 
Loving Family 14K gold pendant charm and necklace.... Loving Family Charm Pendants are made of 14K gold and include an 18 inch 14K gold French rope chain. www.mommysthinkin.com/loving_family_charm_pendants.htm - 16k - Cached - Similar pages

Address of infringing picture which I have not authorized the use of http://www.mommysthinkin.com/images/Loving%20Family%20Images.jpg

3. Complaining party's address
	[private]
	Traverse City, Michigan 49686
	[private]

4. Infringing party's contact information

[private]
Rockton, IL 61072

[private]

5. I have a good faith belief that the use of the copyrighted materials indicated above hare not been authorized by the copyright owner, its agent or the law.

6. I swear under penalty of perjury that the information in this notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner of the exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

[private]

2-26-04
